title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: US envoys arrive in Berlin for latest round of Ukraine peace talks with Zelenskyy

items.title: At least 12 dead, including 1 gunman, in attack on Jewish holiday event on Sydney's Bondi Beach
items.description: Hundreds had gathered for an event at Bondi Beach called Chanukah by the Sea, which was celebrating the start of the Hanukkah Jewish festival.

items.title: Voices of experience and hope soar in a song to prevent suicide

items.title: The cookies that fueled votes for women
items.description: Suffragists didn't just march. They baked, held bake sales and sold cookbooks to raise money for the cause of equality.

items.title: A Hanukkah Attack
items.description: We cover shootings at Bondi Beach, in Australia, and at Brown University.

items.title: Tanning bed users are at higher risk of skin cancer, especially in unusual places
items.description: Indoor tanning is trending among Gen Z. A new study finds tanning bed users not only have a much higher risk of melanoma, they also have DNA damage li...

items.title: What Is Chabad, the Group That Hosted the Hanukkah Event in Australia?
items.description: The global organization represents a branch of Hasidic Judaism. It is dedicated to strengthening Jewish life through educational, cultural and other s...

items.title: The Dark Side of the Global Surrogacy and Fertility Industry
items.description: Eve was one of dozens of Thai women who traveled 4,000 miles — only to be trapped by the dark side of the global fertility industry.

items.title: Here’s the latest.
items.description: Anyone in the area should take shelter, the police said. They declined to elaborate, and details of the shooting were not immediately clear.

items.title: Floods, Mud and Cold Add to Gazans’ Misery
items.description: The rainstorm that battered the enclave this week has left many shivering in tent camps. Despite a cease-fire, rebuilding is still a long way off.

items.title: Leaders worldwide react with horror to the Bondi attack.
items.description: They condemned the antisemitic attack at Bondi Beach and pledged to stand with Jews during a period of rising antisemitism around the world.
